data.name: 911 Operator - Interactive Movie
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT ALSO THESE GAMES:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1272010/Destroyer_The_UBoat_Hunter/


About the Game

Check out also this game!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/793460/112_Operator/

911 Operator Interactive movie is a thriller, which blurs the lines between the terms “viewer” and “player”. The plot concentrates on a 911 operator, acted by Philip Lenkovsky (“Amadeus”, “Stardust Memories”). The player’s role is not only to guide him through the story, but also to manage emergency services, thanks to the gameplay mechanics known from 911 Operator. Your decisions will shape the story and have an impact on its outcome.

Main features:
An exciting, interactive movie thriller with Philip Lenkovsky (“Amadeus”, “Stardust Memories”)
Choices that matter and will lead to one of multiple endings
911 Operator gameplay mechanics implemented into the movie’s narrative

data.short_description: 911 Operator Interactive Movie is a feature-length interactive film, in which the player takes the role of an emergency line operator. Many lives are at stake, based on your decisions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 1GB (720p Low), GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB (1080p Low) or AMD equivalents
  • Storage: 7500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB (1080p High), GeForce GTX 1070 8GB (1080p Extreme) or AMD equivalents
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains alcohol and drug references. The game does not contain sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
